Straight wire sent March 1, 1967 â€”
To: The President of the United States
The White House
Washington, D. C.
Appreciate your suggestion that radio be included in
future facilities acts . Statewide non-commercial
radio for education much needed in North Dakota.
The potential of non-commercial radio in education
must be realized.
H. R. Albrecht, President
North Dakota State University
FARGO MOORHEAD
WEST FARGO
